strings.SS2_PYRO_DESCRIPTION: The Pyro is a survivor who excels in crowd control, torching anything that dares come too close.
strings.SS2_PYRO_OUTRO_FLAVOR: ..and so he left, heart burning with passion.
strings.SS2_PYRO_PRIMARY_DESC: <color=#D78326>Heat up</color> by <style=cIsDamage>burning enemies for <style=cIsDamage>40% damage</style>. May <style=cIsDamage>ignite</style> enemies at <color=#D78326>high heat</color>, with increased chance at the flame's peak.
strings.SS2_PYRO_SECONDARY_DESC: <color=#D78326>Consume 2% heat</color> to burn enemies for <style=cIsDamage>80% damage</style>, pushing them back. <style=cIsDamage>Always ignites</style> at <color=#D78326>high heat</color>.
strings.SS2_PYRO_SECONDARY_ALT_DESC: <color=#D78326>30% heat</color>. Fire a burst of flames, <color=#D78326>igniting</color> enemies for <style=cIsDamage>400% damage</style> and <style=cIsUtility>reflecting projectiles</style>. Extra stocks <color=#D78326>reduce heat consumption by 15%</color>.
strings.SS2_PYRO_UTILITY_DESC: Tap to <style=cIsUtility>dash</style> for <color=#D78326>20% heat</color>. Hold to <style=cIsUtility>leap</style> for <color=#D78326>50% heat</color>.
strings.SS2_PRYO_SPECIAL_DESC: <style=cIsDamage>Ignite</style>. Launch a fireball that deals <style=cIsDamage>400% damage</style> for <color=#D78326>80% heat</color>. Explodes on hit for <style=cIsDamage>150%</style> per applied stack of <style=cIsDamage>Ignite</style>.
strings.SS2_PYRO_KEYWORD_COMBUSTING: <style=cKeywordName>Combusting</style><style=cSub>Resets the duration of ignite stacks each second.
strings.SS2_PYRO_SPECIAL_ALT_DESC: <style=cIsDamage>Combusting</style>. Fire a shotgun burst for <style=cIsDamage>8x50% damage</style>.
